snippet.title: Classic Game Room - SURROUND for Atari 2600 review
snippet.description:
Surround review. http://www.ClassicGameRoom.com
Classic Game Room reviews SURROUND for the Atari 2600 video game system from 1978. If you liked the Light Cycles from the movie Tron then you'll LOVE this game.  Surround also comes with video grafitti so that you can text the people sitting on the same couch as you on a B&W television.  Surruond is dope!  This is a fun classic video game, a true retro arcade old school vintage coin op-style fun game from back in the day in the 1970's and 80's.  If you like wood grained Atari action then you'll dig Tron... I mean Surround.

Be sure to watch the original Classic Game Room episodes. CGRHD is reviewing video game from the past 30 years, from 1978 to the present including Playstation 3 PS3, Sega Genesis, Nintendo Entertainment System NES, Atari 2600, 7800, N64, Dreamcast and Xbox 360. XBLA.
